评论详情: This overshirt is a great option for a cool day when you do not need nor want a heavier coat. I wear a size large in most shirts and jackets, and this top is just big enough to go over any other shirt or sweater I am wearing.  No need for special care. Just toss into the regular wash. I have also put it in the dryer and it did not shrink.

It wasn’t what I was expecting, too stiff for a casual wear I wouldn’t recommend because it feels like a work shirt 😅 but if you’re looking for work shirt this is the one for it.
Looks good. I wear it in my gold office. It heavier than a shirt but lighter than a jacket.

The shirt jacket is nice but I’ll probably only be able to wear once. The xl was too big and the large was too tight. After another wash I’m guessing it’ll even be a little tighter.

评论概述: Fits, but maybe a little slim, also very cookie cutter feeling.
评论详情: Ordered this as a light jacket/outer layer for fall. I ordered my normal size but feel it runs a little slim/tight for me.  The design is fine but very basic and it looks very "flat" in person. All one color with no real definition at seams or the like. It's functional of course, but lacks any real personality.  If you need a simple light outer layer, this is okay.. But at the price point I think you can do better.

评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: It's not terrible. Just kind of stiff and overall a cheap feel.

评论概述: It stiff and feels like denim.
评论详情: I was looking for a thick comfortable open shirt that I could wear around the house.  This one was a little more expensive than the other CooFandy shirt I was looking at, and I thought it would be thicker.  Instead, I found that this one is stiffer, and feels like it is made of denim.  It doesn't retain heat as well as I would like.This isn't a bad shirt, but I would say it would be best for spring or early fall because it looks nice and won't overheat you.  It is durable too, again, it feels like it is made of denim.  It is not a shirt I would wear for warmth, but I would feel comfortable wearing it in light rain.

Did not shrink in the wash. Material is fairly thick and seems durable. It isn’t a particularly warm shirt but could work as a layer or a light coat in spring or fall. Good price and it fits as expected.
Love the texture, how it fits and for its quality for its cost. I would recommend this product.
Good fit. True to size. Looks very nice. Kind of dressy.

I have several "Shackets", Usually worn, unbuttoned, over a colored, lightweight knit T-shirt or something similar. Allows multiple looks with one garment. Great for cool weather wear. I would really like a pocket or two (interior or exterior) to handle small items like keys or pens, etc. Pricing is very good compared to other brands
Nice “shaket” size lg is perfect for 6’ 180*. Perfect weight for heavy shirt or light jacket.
The shirt is thick, but the material is cheap. It’s very stiff. The fit is boxy and the collar is…eh. Overall, it’s a cheap short from China. Not bad, just a bit overpriced for the quality.

better than i thought it would be and heavier too. recommended buy!

Very handsome shirt, smooth sturdy fabric, warm, flattering drape, especially if you have a bit of a belly, true to size. I’m 5’11” and 182 lbs., bought a large, which is a little large on me, but I think a medium would be snug, especially if I were to wear a jersey underneath. Great value.

Fit me great ! One thing to know is it is a heavy shirt if that is what you are looking for.

This is a great fall/winter accessory as it works as a heavier work shirt if you need to keep warm at work or a good-looking light jacket to pull on as you head out the door. I've used it as both, while teaching and shopping. The shirt looks great. I opted for the dark gray to offset some of the black in my wardrobe, and it also pairs nicely with jeans. The fabric is nice and soft, and it fits an American large. The only issue I have is that the buttons are somewhat difficult to button since the fabric is thick, so it's much easier to wear as a jacket than a dress shirt. Still, I like it, and more importantly, so does my wife. It's a fantastic look for work or play!
This is not a flimsy, thin shirt - it is a jacket, and not just a shirt.  Heavier than a flannel.  Love how it fits, well cut.  Definitely meant for the outdoors!

评论概述: Thick cotton shirt works great as a light jacket, but sadly a little too large to fit me properly.
评论详情: Good quality thick cotton shirt! Stitching looks good and I didn't find any loose threads or buttons. Pay close attention to the sizing guidance on the product page—I ordered an XL size, which the size I usually wear in most brands, and this shirt/jacket was much too big to fit me properly. I would suggest ordering a size down from what you typically order for this style or be sure to take more accurate measurements with tailor tape beforehand and use the size chart.

I ordered the Army Green color in Large. The color received is much lighter than that shown online. The color online appears to be enhanced to appear a bit brighter. The large size fit like a fitted medium. The material feels of good, rugged quality, but the size running too small along with the lighter color than expected would make me not want to recommend this product.
Loved it! Can be paired with any tshirt. Great for casual wear. Comfortable to wear. Good quality material used. True fit

评论概述: Solid shirt at a good value
评论详情: This is a great shirt and the expenditure is solid for the value you get.  The material feels heavy-duty and has great stitching with a sturdy vibe. It doesn’t seem to wrinkle easily and hangs really well when worn. Just a heads up, though—you might want to hang it up to dry to avoid any shrinking. It is more like a heavy cotton or canvas rather than a lighter cotton dress shirt (which I like about it). It will be warm in the cooler months and hold up if you want do to more rugged activities with it.  Overall, it’s a stylish and functional piece that’s perfect for a bar night or a work casual day. Highly recommend it if you’re looking for something versatile and sturdy!

评论概述: Looks good it you don't need to move your arms up at all
评论详情: Interesting fabric, work shirt material. Looked good, but I couldn't move my arms up above my head. I don't think it has whatever it needs to do it (a yoke?). It was sized appropriately for me. Wanted to like it, but the lack of being able to move my arms is a deal breaker. Returned it with typical Amazon efficiency and ease.
Everything was great!

There is almost no way that I would wear this as a regular shirt. It's way to heavy for that use. But I expected that when ordering. This is a nice shirt/jacket that I'll be using for sure in the Fall. I had ordered the darker one and really like this. I do recommend it for those looking for something like it.

This shirt has good weight and feel. It is 100% cotton from China. The medium is a little small to start with and after a rinsing it is even smaller. Very lightweight worth buying.

评论概述: Good quality cloth, just some quality control problem.
评论详情: Thanks God I can sew.

This is a great heavy cotton shirt that is very comfortable to wear. The burgundy color looks very nice. The size charts can sometimes be confusing. My normal size is XXL so that is what I purchased. This XXL shirt fit exactly as expected. The shirt is a very lightweight jacket or a very heavyweight shirt. It is particularly comfortable on cooler days that are still to warm for a real jacket. The shirt is heavyweight 100% cotton so it does wrinkle quite easily. Hanging it immediately after washing and drying helps a lot. I did find that the bottom hem rolled up a little and might need ironing to flatten it back out. Although the shirt doesn't require ironing I do think it would look best when ironed. The shirt is well made and should last a long time.
The color and fabric are nice, and it fits as expected. This is also sturdy and is nice to work in.
runs 1 size small. order a size up. good material nicely made and seems very durable. love the green color.

This shirt is really comfortable and warm, which is perfect here in Minnesota for those cool fall days.  Those of us in the Midwest would classify this as a heavy shirt, not a jacket.  It reminds me of my flannel shirts but with stiffer material.  I love the way it looks and the way it fits.  I'm 5'10" and 160 pounds, and the large fits perfectly.  It's well made and "rugged" and will last a long time.  It's the perfect shirt for being outdoors in the spring and fall.  You can throw a sweatshirt on over this shirt when it cools off.  It takes a beating really well--I wear it camping, chopping wood, walking in the woods and more.  I don't need to iron it, either--it comes out of the dryer wrinkle-free.  I've received several positive comments from folks about how it looks.  I'll be wearing this shirt on a regular basis this fall!  I give it 5 stars for the way it looks and fits and for how rugged and warm it is.

评论概述: Great as a casual light weight jacket.
评论详情: Material is a bit stiff, but still comfortable, likely become a bit softer after some use. It is light weight, but not so light that it will not protect against evening chill or cooler winds. It is a welcome addition to my fall/winter wardrobe for layering on cooler days.

This is a nice overshirt.  I would call it medium weight, not lightweight.  It fits as advertised.  Note that you will probably need to iron it as it is cotton.  Overall, I like this shirt and would recommend it.

I confess, I’d never heard of a shacket – didn’t know such a thing existed but I’m now just amazed at the utility of this half shirt, half jacket. I'm using it for cool weather wear and like the look. It is very well made of a heavy weight cotton. The fabric is surprisingly soft and comfortable. It’s not for hot weather wear but ideal for those cool lakeside evenings. It is surprisingly versatile and it works as a shirt in cooler weather and as a light weight jacket for those times when it’s chilly. I found I really liked the ease of maintenance – I tossed the shacket into the washer, then ran it through the dryer and it came out without wrinkles or shrinkage. I wore it almost every day on a recent trip to Alaska – the weather was cool and rainy and this fit the bill perfectly. I wore it over a long sleeve T-shirt which gave me a style I like. I normally wear a medium (5’9”, 150 lbs) and the medium fits me perfectly. Highly recommended – I’m going to get more in other colors for the fall and winter in the lower 48.

评论概述: Heavy and stiff, but comfy with nice fit
评论详情: Heavy cotton button up shirt meant to be used as a layering element.  For a jacket it would be considered 'lightweight', but it's much heavier than your average cotton dress shirt.  Similar in weight to a flannel shirt, but material is much stiffer and coarse.  Almost like a light canvas.  Perfectly comfortable so long as it's layered over a softer shirt.Fits true to size, maybe a little big because it's meant to be worn over other clothes.  Lots of room in the shoulders,  and the stiff material can make the shoulders come to a point or look like you're wearing shoulder pads.  Traditional fit with ample room in the belly.But for the price it's a good layering shirt, and the wine red color I ordered is quite attractive.
The shirt jacket is well designed. Fashionable and made with real good material. A little thicker than denim and is great for fall. Fits me real well and I am ready for fall.

评论概述: Heavier than expected, well-made, not a good fit for taller folks
评论详情: I predict that ten, twenty years from now this sturdy shirt will be one of my well-worn yet still-serviceable casual favorites.  Straight out of the packaging, the first thing that I noticed about this shirt is its weight. I ordered size Large, and this shirt weighs over one pound — about 20 ounces. This fabric feels like a light, supple canvas. During cooler months of the year it could be layered over a t-shirt and serve to some extent as a windbreaker. For me it is too heavy for temps over 75, but it’s fine for temps in the 60’s.  I’m very pleased with the shirt’s color. I ordered it in “wine red,” and the color is rich, deep, and true to what I see on its Amazon page. I can’t speak to how well this color will age, but right out of the box it is gorgeous.  The only negative criticism I have is it doesn’t fit well, though to be honest, I did not expect it to fit my frame perfectly. I’m 6’4” but slender, so I wear a size Large. The XL would fit me around the chest and middle like a bathrobe. This size L is fine in the body, but, when I extend my arm as in the photo I’ve attached here, the shirt’s cuff rides half-way up my forearm. In addition to relatively short sleeves, the shirt isn’t quite long enough in the body to stay neatly tucked in to pants, but it is cut such that it looks good untucked.  With the cuffs rolled up and the shirt worn untucked, it’s a keeper for kicking around home or over a t-shirt for a hike. If the manufacturer will someday make sizes to fit tall folks, I'll certainly buy another.

My husband loves this shirt! It's a nice thicker cotton and not cheap looking or flimsy at all. It fits him very well and is true to their size chart. Looks great with or without a shirt under it but it's a bit heavy to wear by itself, but you could. Love it.

评论概述: Great quality for the price in this thick shirt
This clothing line brand is growing on me, nice shirt
评论详情: I don't really consider this a shacket as it's not as thick as you normally see. But that isn't at all to say it is lightweight. It is quite heavy, almost like a heavier denim shirt material. The XL was perfect for me at 220 lbs 6 ft. 1. It fits nicely and actually is somewhat slimming when worn as a button down shirt. You can obviously also wear it more casually unbuttoned, with a t-shirt underneath, but I think it looks great as a shirt. It isn't soft material but does seem like it is durable and will last many washes and seasons. This is the second Coofandy shirt I've gotten and really like the level of quality for this price point.

评论概述: Larger Sized, But Is An Overshirt
评论详情: My husband is between a size L and a size XL, so we got a size L. It looks quite big for a L and fits more like an XL; however, it is described as an overshirt and is 100% cotton (so it might shrink a tad over time). I could see this being over a turtleneck and still being comfortable. It is quite thick, so definitely a stay-dry-in-the-cool/cold-weather shirt. (Being cotton, you don't want to get it wet while wearing it.) It's nice enough to be work as a work shirt, too. The color is smoky dark blue. Before he officially starts wearing it (in the fall, it's way too hot now in July), I will machine wash it on cold and either hang it dry or dry it on low.

I have a couple of shackets that I like to wear during the winter here in So. Cal.  They offer some protection without being bulky like a jacket.  This one is made of a durable heavy cotton/canvas like material.  The shirt if well made and seems like it could take a beating.I will wear it often.

评论概述: "Sturdy Shacket: A Bit Too Warm for Florida"
评论详情: • Thicker material than expected, limiting wearability in Florida climate • Somewhat stiff, especially restrictive around the shoulder area • Size L fits snugly on my 5'7", 217 lb frame; XL might be better • Comfortable without an undershirt, but limited layering options • Material reminiscent of military uniforms • Would prefer a thinner fabric like poplin for better versatility • Lack of side pockets is noticeable • Good quality, but not ideal for warm weather  Overall, this COOFANDY shacket is well-made but perhaps not the best choice for Florida's climate. The thick material and stiff construction might be perfect for cooler regions, but it's a bit too warm and restrictive for frequent use in hot weather. The fit is on the snug side, so consider sizing up if you're between sizes. While the quality seems good, the lack of side pockets and the thickness of the material limit its practicality. Recommended for those in cooler climates or for occasional use in Florida's milder seasons, but not ideal as a frequent-wear item in warm weather.

评论概述: Very solid all cotton shirt.  Seems well made.
评论详情: Full Disclosure: I received this product at no cost for evaluation through Amazon Vine program.  This is a well made, very solid 100% cotton shirt. It is not light weight, so it is not a great hot weather shirt, but for winter or cool days, it would be great.  It comes with an extra button, which is handy.  I am pretty much a medium in every shirt or coat I buy, but with extra long arms. I normally wear a 15 1/2 x 34 shirt. This shirt fits well, and it even has sleeves which are long enough. I do not know how much it will shrink though.  My intent is to use this shirt as a winter work shirt because it is solid enough to be protective and endure tough use.

评论概述: A durable and well designed shacket
评论详情: This is a really heavy duty cotton over shirt with a contemporary look. I like how durable the fabric is and how well it fits over a tee or lightweight shirt. It isn't too baggy under the arms and not too snug across the chest. Overall a quality shirt that is perfect for cold mornings and outdoor work projects.

This “shacket” (button-down shirt jacket) is another fine shirt from the Coofandy clothing line. I had never seen the term “shacket” before, but this seems to be a good example of one. It’s made of 100% high-quality cotton, designed with great detail, and sturdily constructed with reinforced stitching. It hangs well, and I believe this is because it is more mediumweight than lightweight as described. This will be a great light jacket or shirt to wear over a t-shirt and/or under a jacket. I ordered the version in dark grey (a neutral color that will blend with just about anything) and in medium, which is an exact fit for me. It comes with an extra button and arrives sealed in a nice, transparent Coofandy-labelled envelope.

评论概述: Smells really bad and not remotely lightweight
评论详情: This shirt is a very thick, heavy canvas-like material work shirt/jacket. It’s on the light side for a jacket, but not for a shirt. The product smelled absolutely terrible when I took it out of the package. I’m really hoping the smell comes out in the wash. I’ll look forward to wearing it 3 or 4 months from now when it’s not summer.
Very comfortable , light , soft 100% cotton , and fit perfect .
Thick material, good sizing, no complaints.
Tissus très raide … boutons presque impossible a utiliser les trous sont trop petits … très déçu de cette achat
Ajuste perfecto y muy buena calidad, es más tipo sobre camisa que chamarra
El artículo cubre perfectamente mis expectativas sobre él y me va a ser muy útil.
Grandeur parfaite

Hard to tell from the pics but it definitely is a “shacket” shirt-jacket. Like a quite thick denim-y shirt. It runs too-big - larger than the size I ordered, which I suppose is good as a jacket but it’s still pretty big and boxy for my size. Not the most flattering because of the boxy cut but it is ok. I suspect it will look better after a few washes and a good iron.  I have normal arms but the sleeves run really long and I’ll have to roll them up or get the cuffs taken in if I want to make it look better. the stitching and fabric and buttons seem good. It’s an average value for the money.

This is a thick shirt not a jacket, but perfect for fall weather. Sizing was great, my husband is 5”8 about 170-180 and I got him a large and it fit perfect. Colour was on point too, it doesn’t have that yellow tone behind it
